summary: NAR 03-27-2003      MR      ENGINE COOLANT CONSUMPTION OR COOLANT LEAK   INSPECT FOR MATERIAL DEGRADATION/ REPLACE INTAKE MANIFOLDS.  1995-97 BUICK RIVIERA, 1995-98- BUICK LESABRE, PARK AVENUE, 1996-98 BUICK REGAL, 1998 CHEV LUMINA, MONTE CARLO, 1995-98 OLDSMOBILE 98, 1998 OLDSMOBILE INTRIGUE,  1995-98 PONTIAC BONNEVILLE, 1997-98 PONTIAC GRAND PRIX.    *CB
